channel.title: Non-global Objects
channel.description:
Hey, I need to know how to make non-global objects. For example: I only want some objects appear for donators, how can I do that?
And also, when I add objects in Client.class, it always takes a small time to load them when you log in, how can I fix it?
My Server is Delta based.

item.title: Non-global Objects
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

if(player.donator == 1) {
makeglobalobject(etc, etc, etc, etc, etc);
} else {
deleteglobalobject (etc, etc, etc, etc, etc);
}

Or just make a donator zoneâ€¦

Read full topic
